titleStmt.title: Libertas ecclesiastica, or, A discourse vindicating the lawfulness of those things which are chiefly excepted against in the Church of England, especially in its liturgy and worship and manifesting their agreeableness with the doctrine and practice both of ancient and modern churches / by William Falkner.
titleStmt.author: Falkner, William, d. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Walter Kettilby,
